Trade/Device Name(s): Dexcom G7 Continuous Glucose Monitoring (CGM) System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Dexcom G7 CGM System (Glucose Sensing Subsystem, Mobile Application Subsystem, Receiver Subsystem)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dexcom G7 Continuous Glucose Monitoring System for real-time glucose measurement and diabetes management in persons 2 years and older.
Indications for Use Summary: Indicated for management of diabetes in persons 2 years and older, replaces fingerstick BG testing, aids detection of hyperglycemia and hypoglycemia, and communicates with digitally connected devices including automated insulin dosing systems.
